name: Claude.ai Enterprise
summary_and_recommendation: Claude.ai Enterprise presents LOW RISK for enterprise use with comprehensive security controls and administrative features. Anthropic provides strong data protection, no training use guarantees, full enterprise controls including SSO/SCIM, and transparent security practices. Recommended for general enterprise use including sensitive data processing with appropriate governance frameworks. Consider custom data retention controls for regulated industries.
primary_use_case: Enterprise AI assistance and knowledge management
assessment_notes: High confidence assessment based on comprehensive public documentation from Anthropic's enterprise pages, privacy center, and recent product announcements. Some gaps in specific technical compliance certification details that would require vendor engagement for Tier 2 assessment.

recommendations.title: Implement Full Enterprise Controls
recommendations.description: Deploy SSO integration, configure role-based access controls, and establish audit logging to maximize security benefits of enterprise tier

recommendations.title: Configure Custom Data Retention
recommendations.description: Set organization-specific data retention periods using Claude Enterprise's custom retention controls to meet regulatory requirements

recommendations.title: Establish Usage Governance
recommendations.description: Create internal policies for Claude Enterprise usage, including data classification guidelines and approved use cases

sources.title: Custom Data Retention Controls for Claude Enterprise

detailed_assessment.summary_and_recommendation: Claude.ai Enterprise presents LOW RISK for enterprise use with comprehensive security controls and administrative features. Anthropic provides strong data protection, no training use guarantees, full enterprise controls including SSO/SCIM, and transparent security practices. Recommended for general enterprise use including sensitive data processing with appropriate governance frameworks. Consider custom data retention controls for regulated industries.

geographic_control.justification: Known secure regions (US, EU) with contracts - Anthropic is US-based with documented security practices and enterprise customers can establish specific data processing agreements including geographic controls through commercial contracts.

encryption_standards.justification: Enterprise-Grade Encryption - AES-256 encryption at rest and in transit + vendor-managed keys + published encryption specifications - Anthropic documents comprehensive encryption practices with 'Your data is automatically encrypted both while in transit, and stored (at rest)' with industry-standard encryption protocols.

data_retention.justification: Customer-Controlled Retention - No data retention OR customer controls all retention periods OR immediate deletion available on demand - Claude Enterprise provides custom data retention controls where organizations can 'Set custom data retention periods for your organization's chats and projects' with full customer control.

model_training.justification: Contractual guarantee of no training use - Anthropic explicitly states 'By default, we will not use your Claude for Work data to train our models' with contractual guarantees for enterprise customers that prevent any training use of customer data.

data_sharing.justification: No third-party sharing - Anthropic's enterprise documentation confirms no sharing of customer data with third parties, with dedicated enterprise security controls protecting company data.

admin_management.justification: Full Enterprise Controls - Centralized admin dashboard + user provisioning/deprovisioning + role-based permissions + group management + domain verification - Claude Enterprise provides 'Role-based access with fine-grained permissioning' with 'Single primary owner of a workspace for security and information management' and domain capture capabilities.

audit_capabilities.justification: Comprehensive Auditing - Real-time activity logs + exportable reports + user action tracking + data access logs + compliance reporting features - Claude Enterprise includes 'Audit logs' that 'Trace system activities for security and compliance monitoring' with comprehensive activity tracking.

integration.justification: Full Enterprise Integration - SAML/OIDC SSO + SCIM provisioning + Active Directory integration + API access for enterprise management - Claude Enterprise supports 'Single sign-on (SSO) and domain capture' plus 'System for Cross-domain Identity Management (SCIM)' for automated user provisioning and enterprise identity management.

regulatory_violations.justification: Mostly Compliant - Basic compliance certifications + privacy policy compliant with major regulations + some gaps in specialized requirements - Anthropic maintains enterprise-grade security with Business Associate Agreements available for commercial customers and supports regulatory requirements like GDPR, though specific third-party compliance certifications (SOC 2, ISO 27001) are not detailed in public documentation.

data_processing_transparency.justification: Full Transparency - Published data flow diagrams + specific data processing locations + detailed retention schedules + clear third-party processor list - Anthropic provides comprehensive transparency with detailed data processing documentation, clear retention policies, and explicit statements about third-party relationships for enterprise customers.

documentation_and_support.justification: Comprehensive Documentation - Published security whitepaper + detailed privacy policy + incident response procedures + regular transparency reports + responsive support (replies within 48 hours) - Anthropic provides extensive public documentation through their privacy center, enterprise security documentation, and dedicated enterprise support channels with comprehensive transparency about their practices.
